CustomField.formula: IF(RecordTypeId = '0121B000001hgTt' && ISPICKVAL(MRR__c,"Yes"), (TPSummaryofAnnualizedProducts__c/12) + TPSummaryofNonAnnualizedProducts__c, IF(RecordTypeId = '0121B000001q5Wh' && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Service_Term__c, "1 Time Event")), Amount/12, IF(RecordTypeId = '0121B000001q5Wi' && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Service_Term__c, "1 Time Event")), Amount/12, Total_MRR_Formula__c)))
CustomField.label: Total MRR
